title: DataStax Live! Apache Cassandra™ Data Modeling & Reactive Programming
description:
Cedrick Lunven discusses reactive programming- from Frontend UI to database communications, it’s now possible to develop java applications as fully reactive with frameworks like Spring WebFlux and Reactor. With high throughput and tunable consistency, applications built on top of Apache Cassandra™ fit perfectly within this pattern.

Next up, Patrick McFadin talks about data modeling for Cassandra and how to apply schema design based on your use case and the associated query patterns. -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs
